Question: Indigo Technologies CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Indigo Technologies

Product: Indigo FLOW™ and FLOW PLUS™ Electric Vehicles

- Introducing new class of smooth, roomy, and affordable EVs for rideshare and delivery
- Equipped with breakthrough robotic wheels for smoother rides and more spacious interiors
- Offers more than 250 miles of range with only a 40kWh battery
- Indigo FLOW provides more cargo space than any vehicle of its size
- Active suspension in each wheel for enhanced ride comfort at an affordable price
- Volker Kaese, former Audi Head of Innovation Product Management, joins as Chief Technology Officer
- Eric Obers, formerly design leader at Porsche and Lucid, and Hugh Robinson, formerly of Porsche and General Motors, lead design for the FLOW product line
Summary_cn:
靛蓝科技

产品: Indigo FLOW™ 和 FLOW PLUS™ 电动汽车

- 为拼车和快递提供了一种新型的平稳、宽敞且经济实惠的电动汽车
- 配备突破性的机器人轮子，以实现更平稳的行驶和更宽敞的内部空间
- 仅需40kWh电池即可提供超过250英里的续航里程
- Indigo FLOW提供的货物空间比同等尺寸的任何其他车辆都要大
- 每个轮子都配备主动悬挂系统，以提供价格合理的提升驾乘舒适度
- 前奥迪创新产品管理主管Volker Kaese担任首席技术官
- 前保时捷和Lucid设计主管Eric Obers以及前保时捷和通用汽车员工Hugh Robinson负责FLOW产品线的设计工作
